lead_paragraph: With schools closed for a second day and many side streets still clogged with snow, Newark residents expressed frustration on Tuesday with the slow place of recovery from the weekend storm.

byline.contributor: Jason Grant reported from Newark, and Rick Rojas from New York.
byline.original: By JASON GRANT and RICK ROJAS

headline.print_headline: Several Days Later, Newark Is Still Feeling Effects of a Blizzard
headline.main: Several Days Later, Newark Is Still Feeling Blizzard’s Effects

snippet: With schools closed for a second day and many side streets still clogged with snow, Newark residents expressed frustration on Tuesday with the slow place of recovery from the weekend storm.
abstract: Newark officials say they have made progress in restoring life to normal following blizzard, and that public schools are set to reopen.
